title: of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Digital Services (Levy) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Digital Services (Levy) Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Digital Services (Levy) Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited digital service (levy) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Digital Services (Levy) Act
heading: 2. The 2nd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 

Digital Services (Levy) Act 2024 (No. 26 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 August, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [408] 3
